title: The antiquary
author: Scott, Walter, Sir
snippet: "Indeed, brother, amang a' the steery, Maria wadna be guided by me - she set away to the Halket Craig Head - I wonder ye didna see her."

title: The works of Robert Louis Stevenson;
author: Stevenson, Robert Louis
snippet: About noon there came a blink of sunshine, showing a very pretty, wintery, frosty landscape of white hills and woods, with Crall's lugger  waiting for a wind under the Craig Head, and the smoke mounting straight into the air from every farm and cottage.

title: The works of Robert Louis Stevenson;
author: Stevenson, Robert Louis
snippet: It was drawing near time for my return ; but the uneasiness upon my spirits was that day so great that I must burst through the thickets to the edge of what they call the Craig Head.

title: [Works]
author: Stevenson, Robert Louis
snippet: under the Craig Head, and the smoke mounting straight into the air from every farm and cottage.
